trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationEventArgs class is used to supply event values to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationEventArgs 類別用來提供事件的值給**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，並讓您指定自訂身分識別目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a FormsAuthenticationEventArgs object using the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>建構 FormsAuthenticationEventArgs 物件使用目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性來設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性期間**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件、 表單驗證票證之 cookie 或 URL 中所提供的識別使用。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，才引發的時機驗證<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>設<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>和<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the supplied `context` as the value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件使用所提供`context`做為值<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: It then passes the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs> object to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>目前 HTTP 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>提供存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>目前要求的物件。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>目前 HTTP 要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>要與目前的要求相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>

trans-unit.source: You can use the User property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用使用者內容來設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the User property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不指定期間的使用者屬性的值**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件、 表單驗證票證之 cookie 或 URL 中所提供的識別使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>要與目前的要求相關聯的物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
